text: One of my first collections that I did of my current job, farming, sustainable farming and farming practices. The chickens have this many eggs today and I went into the alfalfa fields and for two and a half hours and then I ate pork. And I was like, this is, wow, this is like the best thing. But it was really interesting. If you took it as an aggregate, you could see the whole perspective and you could see how farmers in the area operated, what they prioritized, what they did for social assumptions, what their political views were, what their social views were, all sorts of things.
